functions.name: loadAllocations
functions.description: Loads the current year's ledger and allotments from webhooks. Returns derived state: available, coming_up, and unavailable.

functions.name: redeemAllocation
functions.description: Takes an item type (e.g. 'Caloric Beverage'), saves redemption to webhook, recalculates derived state.

functions.name: addAllocation
functions.description: Optional. Allows manual override to add back one allocation (useful for testing or corrections).

functions.name: getStats
functions.description: Returns analytics view: usage counts, reset schedule, and percentages used this year.

functions.name: saveAllocationsItems
functions.description: Saves allocation items configuration to webhook.

mvp_notes: Now uses n8n webhooks for all data persistence. No longer uses stub data files.
